description: The initiative is a multi-generational family farming project that emphasizes holistic and organic agriculture. Originating from a lineage of farmers, it has evolved to incorporate regenerative and biodynamic practices. The project aims to create a sustainable and diverse agricultural ecosystem, producing a variety of products, including wine, while fostering community engagement and education about the value of local, organic produce. It seeks to balance traditional methods with modern sustainability challenges.
name: Finca Parera
